def: Radio Free Europe/Radio Liberty Research Institute (RFE/RL Research Institute)

eng: An information bulletin produced by Radio Free Europe based on extensive monitoring of communist bloc news outlets and primarily intended for internal circulation. Pieces were generally contributed by the staff of the research and analysis departments and treated current affairs in the region.
Basic Production Means in the Czech Lands and Slovakia: A Comparison
Current Film Production and Its Prospects
